title: Task-Centered Instruction-Based Education for Strengthening Low-Sodium Diet Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment incorporating self-monitoring and goal-setting activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can set a goal to maintain daily sodium intake below 2,000mg within six weeks and develop a practical action plan.
Learners can enhance self-monitoring skills by recording dietary intake and analyzing sodium consumption using digital tools over three months.
Learners can apply practical knowledge to maintain sodium excretion below baseline levels via 24-hour urine tests at a 3-month post-training follow-up.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
